data.name: Dinner with an Owl
data.detailed_description:
Dinner with an Owl is a short classical point and click adventure.

Explore the sinister mansion of your eccentric owl-like host, who holds his involuntary guests under a puzzling spell.
Can you help them escape this nightmare?
Then brace yourselves for some serious surprises!


This is the enhanced "Dessert Edition" of Dinner with an Owl, featuring:

  • Full professional voice acting
  • Eerie original soundtrack
  • Twisted, looping storyline
  • Classic point and click adventure gameplay
  • Talk to weird characters in multiple choice dialogues
  • Solve the mystery of the owl, to finally escape the mansion

Dinner with an Owl is a short classical point and click adventure.

Explore the sinister mansion of your eccentric owl-like host, who holds his involuntary guests under a puzzling spell.
Can you help them escape this nightmare?
Then brace yourselves for some serious surprises!

data.short_description: Break the puzzling spell of your eccentric host! Dinner with an Owl: A short surreal point and click adventure.
data.reviews:
“Dinner With An Owl is a charming and macabre little game with a simple yet intriguing mystery to unravel. It’s aesthetically beautiful and visually intriguing, and its engagement with surrealism and existential horror is both romantic and wryly self-aware. Anyone with a penchant for the gothic or for escape rooms may find something compelling in Dinner With An Owl, and be left wanting more.”
Sufficiently Human

“The music especially serves to create a very eerie atmosphere. From the piano music, you hear when first starting the game, to the somber background music that plays over the course of the entire game.”
Keengamer

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP or higher
  • Graphics: DirectX compatible card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 102 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
